data.comment: The match has started.
Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Dallas's area.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Dallas.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Kansas City.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 4, Dallas's Jesus Ferreira is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 6, Franco Jara for the away team is judged to be offside.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Franco Jara.
In the minute 9, Bryan Acosta with an assist there.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 15, Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
Kansas City's Khiry Shelton breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ramy Touchan awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Kansas City drive upfield and Johnny Russell gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dallas defender.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Luchi Gonzalez (Dallas) is making a first substitution, with Tanner Tessmann replacing Bryan Acosta.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
In the minute 22, Can Dallas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
Kansas City needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Dallas.
In the minute 28, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Goal kick for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
Ramy Touchan signals a Kansas City throw-in in Dallas's half.
In the minute 29, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 31, Dallas's Brandon Servania has been booked in Kansas City.
In the minute 32, Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kansas City are coming forward and Johnny Russell gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Goal kick for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 39, Ramy Touchan waits before resuming play because Jimmy Maurer for Dallas is still down.
Dallasâ€™s Jimmy Maurer is on his feet again at Children's Mercy Park.
The match at Children's Mercy Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jimmy Maurer, who is down injured.
In the minute 42, Luchi Gonzalez (Dallas) is making a second change, with Kyle Zobeck replacing the possibly injured Jimmy Maurer.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Throw-in for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
The 1st half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 45, Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a Dallas throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Gerso Fernandes has recovered and rejoins the match in Kansas City.
The first-half is over.
Dallas make their third substitution with Bressan replacing Matt Hedges.
Goal! Khiry Shelton levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 45, Gerso Fernandes instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, Gerso Fernandes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 46, Ramy Touchan has blown to start the second-half.
Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Peter Vermes is making the team's first substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Matt Besler replacing Graham Smith.
In the minute 47, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Dallas.
Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dallas defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Dallas have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Kansas City push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Gerso Fernandes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dallas defence.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 53, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In Kansas City Dallas drive forward through Jesus Ferreira. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 54, At Children's Mercy Park, Michael Barrios has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In Kansas City, Cameron Duke of Kansas City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 57, The home team replace Gerso Fernandes with Daniel Salloi.
Graham Zusi is replacing Cameron Duke for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bryan Reynolds is on a sub for Jesus Ferreira for Dallas.
In the minute 64, Harold Mosquera is replacing Brandon Servania for the away team.
Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Kansas City's Johnny Russell attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ramy Touchan awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Dallas's Harold Mosquera is whistled for offside at Children's Mercy Park.
Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Felipe Hernandez (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 72, Attention is being given to Dallasâ€™s Bressan and play has been suspended briefly.
Bressan is back on his feet again.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 74, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gianluca Busio.
Kansas City's Gianluca Busio looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 77, Dallas to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Can Kansas City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Johnny Russell of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 84, Kansas City pushes forward through Johnny Russell, whose finish on goal is saved.
Felipe Hernandez (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Dallas have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Thiago Santos for Dallas has been booked by Ramy Touchan and receives a first yellow card.
Dallas's Tanner Tessmann gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 89, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Dallas needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Daniel Salloi for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Dallas.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
The home team replace Felipe Hernandez with Erik Hurtado.
